mean_en: to fix equipment or furniture into position so that it can be used; to put a new program onto a computer; to put somebody in a new position of authority, often with an official ceremony; to make somebody/yourself comfortable in a particular place or position
sentence: My dad helped me to instal the new cabinets in the kitchen.
sentence_trans: 我爸帮我在厨房安装了一个新橱柜。
